QuestData.Title: An Audience with the Prince
QuestData.Description: Nexus-Prince Haramad has conveyed to me that he is interested in the immediate return of this property to him personally. I would greatly appreciate if you would deliver it in my stead.$B$BIt is a great honor to gain an audience with the nexus-prince, and I am sure that he would be keenly interested in hearing the tales of your adventures here in the Netherstorm.$B$BSeek out his chamber atop the Stormspire to the north. He is often present as a holographic image, which you may address.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Surveying Equipment to the Image of Nexus-Prince Haramad at the Stormspire in the Netherstorm.
QuestData.RewardText: I welcome you to the Stormspire, $c. Please enjoy the hospitality of the Consortium.$B$BYou may place that equipment anywhere. I suspect that you'll be picking it back up rather soon.
